entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Highvale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 26.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
